AnimationState.Script: Prev = CurDrawablePrevAnimationState(); if Prev ~= null and Prev ~= "STATE_Rubble" and Prev ~= "TRANS_IntoRubble" then CurDrawableSetTransitionAnimState("TRANS_IntoRubble") end
Prev = CurDrawablePrevAnimationState(); if Prev ~= null and Prev ~= "STATE_ReallyDamaged" and Prev ~= "TRANS_IntoReallyDamaged" then CurDrawableSetTransitionAnimState("TRANS_IntoReallyDamaged") end
Prev = CurDrawablePrevAnimationState(); if Prev ~= null and Prev ~= "STATE_Damaged" and Prev ~= "TRANS_IntoDamaged" then CurDrawableSetTransitionAnimState("TRANS_IntoDamaged") end
